generation.prompt: Abstract expressionist composition conveying the essence of human desire and fulfillment, flowing organic forms suggesting connection between need and satisfaction, warm resonant colors that evoke joy and utility, emotional landscape rather than literal representation. Using a palette of warm golden energy, deep satisfying blues, vibrant life-affirming oranges, gentle connecting greens. Flowing, organic forms that suggest connection and fulfillment without being literal. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
